website_summaries.verdict: This tear stain remover is packed with premium natural ingredients to nourish as it cleans. Gentle on sensitive eyes, but tough on stains and the bacteria that causes them.
pros: All natural formula enriched with 26 Dead Sea minerals penetrates and lifts both tear and saliva stains
Actively targets bacteria to prevent future stains from forming
Hypoallergenic with antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory properties
Treats and removes both natural stains and those caused by yeast infections
cons: Needs to be used consistently for optimal results

customer_reviews.title: This Product definitely works in reducing ugly Tear Stains on my Maltes
customer_reviews.text: I typed a significant review at the end of my comments. Good product . Actually made noticeable difference after 2 days of using it . Plan on ordering the wipes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, will recommend
customer_reviews.text: Ive just started using this on maltese and morkie, once every other day, it keeps it from gettin worser, im goin start using it 2 times a day and see how it goes. Its easy to use, i wont know more about it until i use it more often than what i have the past few days.so far im impressed, far better than all other products ive used even peroxide didnt work for my maltese daily.
customer_reviews.author: VisionTechr

customer_reviews.title: It works & it's safe
customer_reviews.text: I carry the wipes with us when we take walks in the park and our neighborhood. My dog had developed "dry eye" from construction dust and the summer heat. and these wipes are a must for keeping the eye area clean . I also use the tear and saliva stain remover under her chin and was able to get rid of the ugly red staining her neck. Noticeable improvement was made since the first application. So grateful to Arava for thinking about our pets and producing excellent quality in a safe product ! Will definitely try their entire line of products.
customer_reviews.author: B.G.

customer_reviews.title: Best tear stain remover
customer_reviews.text: We recently adopted a sheepadoodle who gets crusties in her eyes as well as staining on her whtie fur. Our vet recommended a product which did nothing for the staining. Based on reviews, I tried Arava Pet Wipes and Tear Stain Remover. I put some of the remover on a cotton ball and it almost completely removed the stains our pup had since the day we got him. I use the wipes during the day for the crusties and the remover at night. It also works on stains on his beard. I will tell my vet about this amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, noticeable results! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: After researching a number of different brands, I placed my order for Arava Tear Stain Remover solution. My one year old Corgi had some serious tear staining, which would show right back up after being cleaned. I had tried wipes and nothing seemed to work. After a few applications, I have noticed a huge difference. His tear stains have not only lightened, but they have not come back as quickly or dark as before.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: After trying multiple products...this worked!
customer_reviews.text: I have white Toy Poodles and have searched for years to find something that would work on their eye stains. Until now, the only solution has been keeping the corners of their eyes clean shaven Every other product I have tried in the past has just not worked. Then I found Arava! It does a good job at cleaning the brown soiled gook from the corners of their eyes with very little effort. Sometimes on tough stains, it does take a couple if applications, but the stains do eventually go away. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Arava Tear Stain Remover
customer_reviews.text: My little Norwich Terrier puppy developed a bacterial eye infection from playing with my larger older dogs, and he started to develop tear stains. Never had to deal with this with any of my other dogs, so I got some ointment from our vet, and still the stains remain. I purchased all kinds of wipes, food additives, and still they are there. I purchased the Arava Tear Stain Remover because of the reviews. It's surprisingly sticky, but I do see an improvement. The little combs help a lot too. Time will tell if this will remove those ugly stains.
customer_reviews.author: SuAnne Pinoniemi

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a white Shih Tzu with awful tear staines and allergies. Usually he runs from me when it's time to clean his face and I was surprised to see he just sat there and let me do it! Wish I had this a few years ago. I posted photos of my two babies for your viewing pleasure... And Thank you, I know they are beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Redbeardswife

customer_reviews.title: Works Over Time
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this chemically-free product 5 Stars only because I have seen a difference in the tear stains removal although it is not near what I believe it will become. If your expectation is that heavy tear stains will be gone in 1 or 2 applications, this product will deeply disappoint. However, if you follow the instructions and your diligent, the difference will begin to appear. Professionally grooming the ends of the stains off the hair and continuous product use should eventually produce desired results. Of course, if the staining is not improving and may be medically related, discuss this symptom and product with your veterinarian.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great all natural eye cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well on my toy poodle! Her eyes are getting bright underneath finally after being brown for many years. You can see all the brown coming off on the Cotton after using. I also love that it’s all natural and doesn’t sting her eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Cher L.

customer_reviews.title: Finally, what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: For a very long time, I was looking for a natural tear stain remover for my white Maltese. I didn't want to use any harsh chemicals to treat the reddish-brownish stains on his face so I'm really glad that I happened to find this product. I'm familiar with the benefits of the dead sea products and I felt confident that this product would do the work. So far after only 2 weeks of using the tear stains have almost disappeared and my baby's face is white again! I will definitely keep using this product on a daily basis to keep the results.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Works great without any irritation to my sweet Beagle.
customer_reviews.text: This works so well! I have used it on my Beagles allergy eye stains for just 3 days and the stains are almost gone. I didn't expect it to work so quickly. And their right about it stopping future stains. When his eyes water it's much lighter in color. He's all white around his face and mouth so it's very obvious. So glad I found this! It doesn't have a strong scent nor does it bother my dog at all. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Hapi Tami

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with Results, Returning. Eye swollen!
customer_reviews.text: I have never give a one star review but I am very unhappy with the results of this product. I just received my kitten from a breeder so she had been nice and clean before arriving. I used this product a couple of days and her eyes are worse! Switching to eye envy. Buy this at your own discretion but I do not recommend it. I used it on my dog as well and noticed no significant improvement. Had to update she now has an eye infection too :( one of her eyes is completely swollen.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Stain keeps spreading!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this every night for about a month and I can’t see that it’s doing any good. I has spread the stain so much that I’m afraid her once white face is going to end up tan!I wrote the company and they said give it 8 weeks, but I’m almost afraid to! I don’t know what to do!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: My dog had the usual "red" or rust colored tear streaks under his eyes from allergies, which caused his eyes to tear and run a lot. This product, along with Arava liquid solution, made short work of bringing the fur surrounding his eyes back to clear and naturally colored--no more stains. I am very happy with this product, and so is my boy, Ansel!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Readinger

customer_reviews.title: Significant stain removal after weeks of use, with no harmful side effects
customer_reviews.text: Significant tear, beard stain improvement in 1st 3 weeks. Will repost in another few weeks and add 5th STAR, if stains are gone. Love that this is natural and doesn't sting or smell funny. Odorless. Hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: Morris or Debra Eisenberg

customer_reviews.title: Safety concerns
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived to my home and a large portion of the liquid had leaked out of the bottle tip since there wasn’t any safety seal around the top of the bottle or under the bottle cap. I’m Going to return the product since it was a sticky, viscous brown liquid yet is supposed to whiten tear staining and I’m not certain that didn’t denature or isn’t a tainted product. I will not be purchasing anything from this vendor in the future.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hefner RN

customer_reviews.title: Bottle leaked and wasn't secured by seal.
customer_reviews.text: The bottle arrived leaked and sticky. There was no security seal around the cap so I have no idea if this is a used or returned item. I don't even know if the solution inside is real. I will return it. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: This liquid does not work
customer_reviews.text: A majority of the reviews left below are for the wipes and NOT for this liquid which is what the reviews should be about. Does not work on its own. Tear stains still remain. Puppy also has VERYY irritated eyes with this product. Wayyyy too overrated and will never ever buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product that helps stain on hair near the eye area
customer_reviews.text: I own a Bichon Bolognese who is all white. From time to time I purchase various tear stain cleaners and I can say from experience this is the best that I have purchased. Yes, I continue to purchase this product because if you use it continually, it will work. Fantastic product which happily Amazon sells and where I found it. Cannot say enough good things about this product. Thank you for making such a great product. Recommend to people with white dogs, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hirschman

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both the Arava tear Stain Cleaner and the Arava Pet Eye Wipes For my little white Havachon. She was beginning to get those pinkish tear stains. After the very first time I used them, no more tear stains. I now only have to clean near her eyes about once a week and she stays sparkling white. Also works extremely well around her muzzle. Little white dog muzzles get so stained from eating and drinking, but not if you use Arava!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bear

customer_reviews.title: not sealed
customer_reviews.text: there was no seal on the bottle which allowed sticky brown liquid to leak out. i am not sure if its safe to use now
customer_reviews.author: Maryellynn Taggart

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it on my puppy's tear stains since I purchased it on April 17, 2020...and nothing... No changes...what so ever...in fact the staining appears to be getting darker. I researched the product and it supposedly had good reviews...but I don't believe them after trying it for myself. I would not recommend this product to anyone.. Its a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Jasper's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: We are satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for one week and it seems to be working great. He still has some crusting but I am able to remove it with a flea comb. His eyes are brighter and he has stopped scratching at them. This has worked where other more expensive products and supplements have not. I recommend it and will be buying the eye wipes to go with the drops.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie O'Meara

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for performance, 4 for value
customer_reviews.text: My maltipoo’s tear stains arent that bad so its not worth putting a comparison photo. Im just very particular about my dog’s appearance and this solution has definitely reduced the amount of staining around my dogs eyes. Before you would have to be holding him up to your face to see the stains. Now, you cant see it until you start spreading some of the fur around the eyes. I use it 4 times a week for maintenance. I do think its over priced though. 5 stars for performance, 4 stars for value
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was supposed to be natural, but after reading the label, it contains PROPYLENE GLYCOL in it. So much for your “Natural Product”. The products is for stains around pets eyes, Yet it says AVOID CONTACT WITH EYES. WHAT!!
customer_reviews.author: Girly Girl

customer_reviews.title: My first two bottles were light yellow serum in color.
customer_reviews.text: Now I have bought my third bottle and it is clear to white in color and . The first two bottles I bought were yellow to tan in color. I ask a question what color is this serum . The answers were clear. So that tells me I bought two that were not the true serum in the bottle or was too old . I have not seen it work no matter what color it is. I won't buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They really work!
customer_reviews.text: My maltipoo has the worst eye drainage, and I've spent so much money trying to find something to help keep her eyes from being tear-stained and her hair around her eyes from having that "crunchy" feeling. These eye wipes do the trick! It takes a bit of time, but stick with it and you'll be pleasantly surprised. I purchased the tear stain remover as well, and I will purchase both again!
customer_reviews.author: CCarter

customer_reviews.title: DOESN’T WORK
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful this product would work, but it didn’t have any improvement on my dogs under eyes. The liquid left a yellow pigment on the eyes making it look worst than when it started. We used it diligently for weeks to give it a fair shot but in the end it didn’t make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jake P

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: They remove the cuck off and come away dark with stain. BUT the eye stains still remain even after months of use. Still, they make my pups face smell good and definitely defineey remove fresh tears. I’m going to try and use it twice a day and see if that helps remove the old stain
customer_reviews.author: Blissful Cooks

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!It took 2 months of 3-4 times a week but her eyes are great now!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Pomeranian, she has allergies and I didn’t use it every day as recommended, but it worked after 2 months! I will keep using it so they don’t get so bad again! Thank you !!!!
customer_reviews.author: so on an so forth

customer_reviews.title: Tear Stains Gone!
customer_reviews.text: I am using the Arava Tear Stain Remover to remove the reddish brown tear stains from my dogs’ eyes. I am happy to say that it works perfectly. Very easy to use. I just squeeze the liquid from the bottle onto a cotton ball and wipe their little faces where the stains are. After about one week the stains were less and after two they were gone! Nice to have a product that actually does what it says. I also like that it is all natural.
customer_reviews.author: Celine Diane

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Photos speak volumes. On the left is the “before” on the day this kitten was brought out of a shelter. On the right is after just a few treatments with the Arava liquid cleanser on a cotton round. Began seeing results after first use. Non-irritating to his eyes and nose and zero offensive fragrance in the product. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JGraham

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I've been struggling with my baby with tear eye stains and I finally found something that actually works! it took about 2 weeks to see the difference. I had to constantly use this product and after a week I trimmed my baby's hair around the eyes. Then I also purchased their wipes and it works wonder. His stains are way better compare to before. I will find before and after pics and upload it here.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Keston

customer_reviews.title: Sadly disappointed in product
customer_reviews.text: I too read all the glowing reviews and wanted this product to work on my older maltipoo’s dark eye stains but it did nothing to improve them. I even went back and read the responses to the negative reviews and followed those instructions.. still did not improve. I am greatly disappointed as I had such high hopes for this product but it did not help my pet.
customer_reviews.author: Clairity

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for us!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this did not work for my puppy. I use another product from Amazon, that works a lot better for us. Also, this product stinks. It is a deep yellow gold color, and smells bad. It made no difference on my puppy’s tear stains. I probably would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Irma A.

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: The smell isn’t great and my fury friend doesn’t seem to love it (he rubs his eyes while I’m trying to let it set in on the carpet or couch) but it works really well. I have a toy poodle whom I think def has “poodle eyes” as I’m cleaning his eyes daily. But this really softens all eye gunk making it easy to wipe away. I’ll continue to use it. One star docked only because i wish it was scentless.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the product. I have a hard time getting my dog to let me clean his tears and this product is not for him at all, you are supposed to apply it, wait and hr and then rinse. My dog wasn't happy at all about that. I've also been using it for over a month now and do not notice a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Norms

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the first tear stain remedy that actually works. It has made a major difference in clearing up the stain on my little white dogs eyes. No new stains are showing up and the old ones are lighter and growing out.
customer_reviews.author: Book Guru

customer_reviews.title: Dog hates it. Recommend against use.
customer_reviews.text: I use a cotton swab to carefully apply and keep out of eyes but it still irritates and my dog rubs at her eyes a bunch. It also has particles in it that clog up the dispenser. I switched to colloidal silver which causes no reaction and kills bacteria keeping her beautiful and irritation free.
customer_reviews.author: H. Byers

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for the tear stains under my dogs eyes. States on the bottle to use for four weeks. I started using the day I received it in the mail on December 23, it is now January 22, 8:36 PM.. I still see no difference in the tear stains under my dogs eyes.. yes I used the product properly. Doesn’t work..
customer_reviews.author: anniwats

customer_reviews.title: Puppy's preferred brand
customer_reviews.text: I use this on a 6-month old cavapoo withe dark grey fur and red eye stains. This hasn't completely eliminated them, but keeps them under control. We also use the eye wipes made by the same company. The brand we we're using before would have pup resisting nightly eye cleaning, but he tolerates these two products much better. You do need to use a cotton round (or similar) to apply and let it sit for about an hour so planning ahead is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: MRSO

customer_reviews.title: Fast tear stain removal gets better over time
customer_reviews.text: The first day I could tell the difference but it does help to put on a wet wet cloth or wet cotton ba
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Kimmer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my pup
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use however I didnt follow the recommendations of applying with a cotton swab. Really? Near the eye? I felt more comfortable with a small cotton ball. No real smell at all to the product. Used for over 2 month daily and no improvement.
customer_reviews.author: laura bartscher

customer_reviews.title: Totally worked after just a couple of days
customer_reviews.text: Have had this product for over a year now and have applied it three different times to the same cat's eyes. Each time, they cleared up after 2-3 days, and stayed clear for months. It is really unbelievable, since this cat has had the brown gunky stuff for years. He is now handsome and irritation-free. I don't know why it works, but it does, and we are completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mlle H

customer_reviews.title: Tear cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Honestly no really work on my dog...and so thick like paste. I brought the bottle of the tear cleaner lotion not the wipes just want to clarify. thx
customer_reviews.author: dorothy

customer_reviews.title: A helping hand to make a delicate task easier!
customer_reviews.text: I used the product to clean the eye area of My 14 yeaer old Shitzu, Baxter.. He has a lot of hair around his eyes and sometimes secretions build ip and harden in that area and forms crust almost in his eyes. He is not a fan of having his eyes cleaned so I am tackling it slowly so it may take a little time before I can give you a thorough review of the results. Ithis works to make removal of the stains easier, I am all for it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't sting!
customer_reviews.text: We have a blonde goldendoodle and any tears make stains. I read about many products and went with good reviews. I can add to the good reviews. This product works extremely well; I am very pleased. Follow directions and you will get good results. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: jett

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after much satisfactory result I got from their cleaner. But not sure if it really works. The small napkins in the case were mostly dry and I had to throw away quite a few until I get to some that were mildly dampened. Even those do not do much more than what a regular tissue paper does. So, not so happy.
customer_reviews.author: F. Akhbari

customer_reviews.title: Does Nothing
customer_reviews.text: Did absolutely nothing. And of course the window to return it has closed. No wonder it tells you to use for 8 weeks...
customer_reviews.author: Fura

customer_reviews.title: Arava works for my girls eyes
customer_reviews.text: My girl is not happy with anyone touching her eyes but I used the Arava liquid to saturate a pad and soak her area that is stained under her eyes. I was able to remove the clumps that had dried and used the Arava wipes to cleanse the area this morning. Teddie does not act like it is uncomfortable at all and sits quietly on my lap when I did the treatment. Thank you Arava for a product that is natural with no Antibiotics. Ina WRIGHT
customer_reviews.author: Inasroses

customer_reviews.title: Soooo Good
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this product.. It is easy to use, gentle on the dogs fur/skin, smells fresh & works beautifully . The cost is reasonable as well. You won't be disappointed & neither will you furry friends as it keeps them fresh & clean, free from eye infections. Will always keep it on hand.. TY
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: WET COTTON BALL, WAIT...then WIPE.  EASY!
customer_reviews.text: Going to start with 5 stars as I’m optimistic it will be a great product. Delivery 🚚 was perfect. I’m using it on my tear stained champagne colored toy poodle. This is yet another attempt to get that terrible brown stain that takes up so much of her sweet face. I will use as suggested for 4 weeks; then I will review again about her progress.🤞
customer_reviews.author: ABBEY’s MOM

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have over time ordered 8 bottles of this product so obviously I like it! I had used other products with some success but not great success. Unfortunately, I don’t have pictures before I started using this product. My pup had long red stains on his buff colored face. He is a cocker spaniel and his eyes do run thus the staining. I saw results quickly.of course his eyes will always run but with this product no staining. He is groomed every three weeks so old hair is shaved off regularly. Sorry for the cone but he had just had knee surgery.
customer_reviews.author: David F. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work. Nope. Not even close.
customer_reviews.text: I'll be adding this to all the other products that don't work on my white Shih-poo's eye stains. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: MommaMia

customer_reviews.title: The best for your pup
customer_reviews.text: Spent a lot of time trying to decide which eye wipe to go with; and I’m so glad I chose this one! This stuff is amazing; and great ingredients! Use it in the morning, daily to every other day, to wipe my old cavaliers eyes; and it has made a huge difference in goop (he suffers from allergies) and stains!! Happy and handsome pup! Definitely repurchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Vidales

customer_reviews.title: Works better than other things
customer_reviews.text: It works better than other things I have tried But it will not get rid of tear and mouth stains on a white poodle/bichon. It does soften up any gunk that has formed making it easier to keep area clean but it does not stop or remove staining.
customer_reviews.author: W.B.

customer_reviews.title: Doggie essential
customer_reviews.text: I use this with the Arava tear stain removing wipes and I think the combination of the two gives the best results. This gel makes a noticeable difference though (I used to use just the wipes). I use this every other day and after the first time I used this on my dog I was surprised to see significantly less staining!
customer_reviews.author: DealSeeker

customer_reviews.title: My pup did not like this one bit :(
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old white mini poodles who is usually very chill, did NOT like this. If she saw the bottle, she would run away into her kennel. So sad. Also, I didn't get the stain fading results I was hoping for. Unfortunately, I missed the 30 day return deadline.
customer_reviews.author: Hmh2012

customer_reviews.title: Good Luck
customer_reviews.text: Used faithfully until used up. Didn’t help with stains Liquid is Amber to brown color with some floating solids.
customer_reviews.author: Granprixfan

customer_reviews.title: Clean your tears
customer_reviews.text: This just DOES NOT WORK. Try a different product because this one sucks. It's horrible reading all the "it works if you use it 2x a day,! The photoshopped photos. I wish we could flag reviews if we even SUSPECT it's NOT REAL
customer_reviews.author: Catherine, Impress of Z Internet

customer_reviews.title: Going good so far
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy to use this product is. I just get some solution on a cu-tip and clean once a day. I have been using this product on my dog for a couple weeks now, I do notice the brown spots on my dogs eyes getting a little lighter. The product states that you must use it every day for six weeks to get complete results. I’m excited to see what the future holds.
customer_reviews.author: Tosha Saincome

customer_reviews.title: SAND MAN-YOU'RE FIRED
customer_reviews.text: My Chihuahua mix was starting to look like a racoon with black lines down his eyes. I was able to clean them (he hated that) the time it took and the rubbing really pissed him off- With Arava Pet Eye Wipes its so much easier and faster I and the Chihuahua couldn't be happier. Way less time, and far better results! No more racoon face-
customer_reviews.author: JERRRYY

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the liquid, i put some on a soft toothbrush and brush it on the stains. Some of the debris comes off on the brush. Her stains are lightening up but its going to take some time. Would like to try the pads along with the bottled stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Oderkirk

customer_reviews.title: It works an your dog actually likes it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product. If I used it every day it really improved my Maltese’ tear stains disappear without any harsh chemicals. He enjoys any attention so he never got upset or avoided me when he saw the bottle and graciously allowed me to put it on his tear stains. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Legend

customer_reviews.title: Need to use for more time to see proper results
customer_reviews.text: I am currently using the liquid product. It seems to be cleaning the eye stain but is too early to tell if it will get rid of it completely with regular use. I have tried so many things and spent so much money I’m hoping to be very pleased with the long term result.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Our dog HATES the smell
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to work but once our pup smells it she hits the deck running. It does have a strong smell and is thick so not only do you have to apply it but you have to remove it also. frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: S Kett

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This product really works. I first tried Burt’s Bee and didn’t see much of a difference after a couple months so I started using this product on my chihuahua mix and I started seeing a difference right away. The only thing I don’t care for is the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Run Time

customer_reviews.title: great surprise
customer_reviews.text: This product Really WORKS. wish I could share before and after photos. Started using it right after a grooming, it immediately started turning color. Most I f all it has prevented new tearing from crusting.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Gritty, you have to remember to shake it and it does not work
customer_reviews.text: The product is Gritty, it does not work, my dogs eyes are worse than before. I had bought two bottles and I am on the second one and coming on here to re-order the product I had before this. The first bottle I did not shake often enough and all the stuff settled to the bottom and I had to throw it out. I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Loving this so far!
customer_reviews.text: I had my pup on another product for over a year, but I decided to try this cleaner, and it works! I also bought the wipes, but it really clears off my pup's tear stains pretty well. It's much much better than the other product, and my Max doesn't mind me wiping his eyes at all!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Herold

customer_reviews.title: Gentle Eye Stain Cleaner for Dog
customer_reviews.text: This is a gentle product to clean the stains that my little white dog gets under her eyes. It does not wipe away the stains in one use, but is effective when used on a regular basis. I also purchased this product in pre-moistened wipes.
customer_reviews.author: J4USA

customer_reviews.title: Wife said should’ve got this one at first
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really care about my dog’s stain tbh, but my wife does. So after two or three products that didn’t work, we finally got this one and we could instantly tell it’s a lot better. So I would recommend getting this one instead of the others.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried using this several times and it did nothing. My favorite part about this product is that it says “avoid contact with eyes”. How am I supposed to clean my dog’s eyes while I worry about not getting the product in her eyes?
customer_reviews.author: Ron Sitz

customer_reviews.title: Our puppy likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Pet eye wipes are easy to use and gentle on our puppy. They work! We’ve been using it for several weeks and the stains are lightening up. The dog realizes it doesn’t sting and is more receptive to the wiping. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Two point five

customer_reviews.title: Did not seem to work for my Maltese
customer_reviews.text: I find that water on white gauze and a little deluted hydrogen proxide on stained fur works best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: How am i supposed to wipe my dog ‘s eye with this brownish liquid? But i did trying to avoid touching the eye , after 3 weeks of using , did absolutely nothing but caused my dog eye redness, i will not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: maria rutz

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised, but it works. It needs to be continued or the tears come back tho, but it clears them up for the day. Gets my puppy's face clean too! :-) I was happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Great tear stain remover
customer_reviews.text: We love this tear stain remover for our puppy. It’s really keeping the stains at a minimum. We use it every day and it never irritates his eyes. I would highly recommend this product and will definitely purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: E's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Helps Chupi (Ben El Tavori) With His Teary Eye Problem
customer_reviews.text: Marvelous product but this is not for your dog's eyes. It is primarily a balmy liquid that can help with crusty eyes from excessive tearing or warts around the eyes. I like it because it helps my dog's tearing problem as Chupi's eyes look like Ben El Tavori thr famous Israeli pop star, one half of Static and Ben El.
customer_reviews.author: Ohad Adi Weitzman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t help specially if your cat or dog they are white
customer_reviews.text: Very clear product and has no smell but unfortunately didn’t help my cat eye discharge problem because my cat he is white and when I tried to clean around his eyes with this product with cotton ball all his hairs got yellow, didn’t like the product at all
customer_reviews.author: ayrin hacopian

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff DOES NOT WORK!!! I’ve been using it since JANUARY!! Once a day as directed for 7 months now what a waste of money and it clogged up the bottle so I emptied it and it’s all thick and goey .... I purchased the wipes 2 weeks ago and they seem to be working better so don’t waste your money on the solution just buy the wipes instead !!
customer_reviews.author: Celso

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work for me. I don’t think my dog likes it either, she rubs her face in the carpet after I put it on her. I have tried this for 3 weeks now, still little to no results.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: This product does not remove or reduce the tear stains on my cat. After soaking a cotton pad and wiping his face, I don’t see an improvement at all.
customer_reviews.author: Debbsterns

customer_reviews.title: It's good.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it every day on my red toy poodle puppy. Her eyes secrete something black and sticky and even hard. This product is helpful but there's still a lot of scrubbing involved and I end up scraping the worst of it off with my fingernails.
customer_reviews.author: M. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good when I can apply for he wipes to my dog.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased many products for my cream colored Pom and nothing worked as well as the Arava wipes. The only problem is that I don’t use it on a regular basis because my dog hates the process. He squirmed so much that it’s impossible not to get them inside his pupils.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Works ok and he doesn't seem to mind me using it on him.
customer_reviews.text: My terrier mix gets black drainage from his eyes. That's why I bought this product. It works fine but I didn't like being forced to buy two bottles. He doesn't seem to mind me using it on him which is very important.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S.

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it says
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how quickly this solution cleared up my dog's tear stains. Significantly improved after just one use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Chirn

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog’s eyes teary
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t help removing my dog’s eye stain. It even made him more teary. Might be because it was too strong to be applied close to his eyes. He kept rubbing his face on the carpet after applying this. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sammyy

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to burn my dogs eyes.
customer_reviews.text: I have always been able to clean her eyes with other cleaners but she really didn't like it when I used this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Use consecutive and will see the results
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because it’s been helping my little buddy to clear his darkness stain around the eyes , I really glad to find this on amazon and also recommend it to all who like me owns a pets with the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Yacop75

customer_reviews.title: It's a must have for my dog. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Really works. Been looking for a product to remove all of my dogs stains. Follow up with wipes as recommended. First week is not going to see too much of change. After that it is unbelievable the stains are going away.
customer_reviews.author: argunia

customer_reviews.title: Effective Even for a Puppy
customer_reviews.text: My puppy didn’t give me any problems while using this product. He’s only four months old so you know how difficult this can be especially the first time I recommend this without any hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: cannoli13

customer_reviews.title: So Excited it's working!
customer_reviews.text: Only been using for a little over a week. Little by little I can see the hair lightening! So excited to keep using! Looking better!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Mangum

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work . Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn’t work at all. I used it for quite a while on my pure white Persian who struggles with tear stains . This literally did nothing at all for her . Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Joyner

customer_reviews.title: I can see it working...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the solution eye wipes for a few weeks now on my white Havapoo's eye area. Being a short-nosed breed, her eyes stain on a daily basis from the tears. Applying this solution has begun to reduce the stain and her face looks much cleaner and without the red/orange stain. I'll keep applying on a daily basis as suggested up until weeks or so.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cupboard full of wipes and chews that said they would remove stains and didn't. This product actually works. It is natural and mild and doesn't irritate my dog's skin or eyes. I am so thankful I found it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Seliger

customer_reviews.title: Eye stain cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Nothing cleans a pets eyes except peroxide & that cannot be used around the eye area. So if you can just cut the hair around the eyes so the tears cannot stain but be extra extra extra careful you might puncture their eye. Let a vet do it not yourself
customer_reviews.author: susan m.

customer_reviews.title: Good and easy
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my Pomeranian's eyes. It works pretty well, not perfect. Not hard to use. I put it on with my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Iher

customer_reviews.title: Washing around eyes at bath time does better.
customer_reviews.text: Did not like used it to remove eye stain which it did not do.
customer_reviews.author: Laveda

product_meta.title: Arava - Tear Stain Remover - Eye Stain Cleaner for Dogs & Cats - Natural Ingredients & 26 Dead Sea Minerals - Safe & Effective for Pets - Removes Tear & Saliva Stains & Prevents New Ones
feature_bullets: REMOVE EYE TEAR & SALIVA STAINS from your dog’s or cat’s face. The 100% natural ingredients combined with the 26 skin- nourishing Dead Sea minerals will penetrate your pet’s hair structure and remove existing eye tear and saliva stains
PREVENT NEW PET TEAR & SALIVA STAINS by killing the bacteria that cause them. The Arava tear stain remover for dogs includes natural ingredients which will help prevent saliva stains

UNLIKE ALL THOSE CHEAPLY-MADE DOG TEAR STAIN REMOVERS that promise immediate action but fail to deliver, our eye tear stain cleaner for pets is the only treatment that will offer you permanent results, if used correctly. It might take 4-8 weeks to remove stains, but the results will last
COMBINE OUR PET EYE STAIN REMOVER WITH THE ARAVA PET EYE WIPES for maximum results

100% CLEAN, HEALTHY & HAPPY PETS OR YOUR MONEY BACK! That’s our unconditional 30-days guarantee! If you are not 100% thrilled with your tear stain cleaner for pets, then we promise to offer you a full refund
